parametrized_description: A mine transports TotalOre units of ore to the surface using small wagons with capacity SmallWagonCapacity and large wagons with capacity LargeWagonCapacity. The number of small wagons must be at least MinSmallToLargeRatio times the number of large wagons. Additionally, at least MinLargeWagons large wagons must be used. The objective is to minimize the total number of wagons required.

SmallWagonCapacity.description: Capacity of a small wagon in units of ore

LargeWagonCapacity.description: Capacity of a large wagon in units of ore

MinSmallToLargeRatio.description: Minimum ratio of small wagons to large wagons

MinLargeWagons.description: Minimum number of large wagons required

TotalOre.description: Total units of ore to be transported

constraints.description: The combined capacity of small and large wagons must be at least TotalOre units of ore.
The number of small wagons must be at least MinSmallToLargeRatio times the number of large wagons.
At least MinLargeWagons large wagons must be used.

objective.description: The objective is to minimize the total number of wagons required.
